briefdescription.para: Check if automatic startup is enabled.

simplesect.para: true if auto startup is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable automatic startup.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to enable automatic startup or not.

simplesect.para: int 0 on success, non-zero on failure.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the LwM2M custom settings are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: if LwM2M custom settings are enabled.

detaileddescription.para: Enable or disable the LwM2M custom settings.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to enable LwM2M custom settings or not.

briefdescription.para: Determines which carriers are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Bitmask corresponding to carrier oper_id values.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether bootstrap from Smartcard mode is disabled.

parameterdescription.para: if bootstrap from Smartcard mode enabled.

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable bootstrap from Smartcard mode.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to enable bootstrap from Smartcard mode or not.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the LwM2M custom server settings are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: if LwM2M custom server settings are enabled.

detaileddescription.para: Enable or disable the LwM2M server custom settings.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to enable LwM2M custom server settings or not.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether server_uri is an LwM2M Bootstrap-Server or an LwM2M Server.

parameterdescription.para: if server_uri is an LwM2M Bootstrap-Server, false if server_uri is an LwM2M Server.

briefdescription.para: Indicate if server_uri is an LwM2M Bootstrap-Server or an LwM2M Server.

parameterdescription.para: true to enable server_uri as an LwM2M Bootstrap-Server

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the server URI from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the server URI in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the server lifetime from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the server lifetime in the custom LwM2M settings.

parameterdescription.para: Server lifetime (in seconds). Used only for an LwM2M Server.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the server binding from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the server binding in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve DTLS session idle timeout from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the DTLS session idle timeout in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve CoAP CON interval from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the CoAP CON interval in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the security tag from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the security tag in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the APN from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the APN in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve PDN type from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the PDN type in the custom LwM2M settings.
Determines whether the LwM2M custom device settings are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: if LwM2M custom device settings are enabled.

detaileddescription.para: Enable or disable the LwM2M device custom settings.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to enable LwM2M custom device settings or not.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the LwM2M device manufacturer name from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the LwM2M device manufacturer name in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the LwM2M device model number from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the LwM2M device model number in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the LwM2M device type from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the LwM2M device type in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the LwM2M device hardware version from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the LwM2M device hardware version in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the LwM2M device software version from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the LwM2M device software version in the custom LwM2M settings.
Retrieve the LG U+ Service Code from the custom LwM2M settings.
Set or update the LG U+ Service Code in the custom LwM2M settings.
Determines the LG U+ Device Serial Number type to be used.

parameterdescription.para: LG U+ Device Serial Number type.

briefdescription.para: Indicate the LG U+ Device Serial Number type to be used.

parameterdescription.para: The LG U+ Device Serial Number type to be used.
